description: Some travellers are required to quarantine for a week until they receive a negative test result.
title: Coronavirus: Self-isolation for some Guernsey arrivals cut to seven days
title_page: Coronavirus: Self-isolation for some Guernsey arrivals cut to seven days - BBC News
maintext: Passengers from the UK will be given the option for the seven-day test under Category B, however some areas of the UK could require a 14-day mandatory self-isolation, the States said.
